page.title: 12MILTON IN THE 20th CENTURY
page.content: OF LONG SKIRTS,TELLING PEOPLE THAT A LADY IS STEPPING OUT OF THE COACH AND WALKING ACROSS TO THE HOUSE. {THE FIELD SURVEY:}WE NOTED THE CROPS GROWING IN EACH FIELD.BY LOOKING AT A LARGE SCALE MAP, WE DISCOVERED HOW MUCH LAND IS USED FOR AGRICULTURAL PURPOSES.OUT OF A TOTAL OF 275 HECTARES,WE DISCOVERED THAT CEREALS WERE THE MOST POPULAR WITH SUGAR BEET A CLOSE SECOND;WE ALSO DISCOVERED THERE WERE NO FIELDS PREPARED FOR CATTLE AND ONLY A FEW PADDOCKS FOR HORSES.THE RESULT OF OUR SURVEYS HAVE BEEN RECORDED AS FOLLOWS 4 FIELDS WERE PADDOCKS,25 WERE CEREAL(19.44%),19 WERE SUGAR BEET(16.66%),2 WERE POTATOES(4.16%),12 WERE GRASS LAND (8.33%)5 WERE WINTER BARLEY(4.16%),6 WERE SPRING BARLEY(4.16%),1 WAS SOFT FRUIT(1.38%),2 WERE WASTE LAND.
